== Veloor  (Part) (628168) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Veloor  (Part) is a village in the [[Kottayam]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 201 hectares and harbouring 352 households with total population of 1533 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kottayam]] is at a distance of 4 km. Male population is 782 and female population is 751. Scheduled Caste Population is 369 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 628168<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 1386 (90.41%)
* Literate male population: 696 (89.0%)
* Literate female population: 690 (91.88%)
